    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarGame()
      default constructor which creates a new shuffled Deck and cuts it, giving half to p1 and half to p2 an empty CardPile stack is set aside to hold all cards out of the player's hands

    • Constructor Detail

      • WarGame

        public WarGame()
        default constructor which creates a new shuffled Deck and cuts it, giving half to p1 and half to p2 an empty CardPile stack is set aside to hold all cards out of the player's hands

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public Card draw(CardPile hand)
        takes a card off the top of the passed CardPile
        Parameters:
        hand - the CardPile to be drawn from
        Returns:
        the Card on top of hand

      • flip

        public CardPile flip()
        first checks either player has run out of cards or is about to enter a war without enough cards. then draws a card from p1 and p2 and puts them into a CardPile, which is added to the stack of cards in the middle.
        Returns:
        null if there is a winner, or the two newly flipped card if the game is continuing

      • checkWar

        public boolean checkWar()
        checks if either Cards on top of the stack are bigger than the other. if so, the winning player gets the stack added to the bottom of their hand. else, go to war
        Returns:
        true if neither top cards are bigger, false if a player has won the battle

      • war

        public CardPile war()
        first copies the stack into another CardPile, then flips two cards and adds them to it.
        Returns:

        public String getWhoWins()
        accessor for whoWins field
